content.description:
You will hear the opening of the Gloria section of a mass. The excerpt will be played three times. Before listening to the music for the first time, please read the text printed below and read the questions.

Gloria in excelsis Deo

et in terra pax hominibus bonae voluntatis.

Laudamus te, benedicimus te,

adoramus te, glorificamus te.
content.question: The cadence on the word "Deo" is

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

topic.text: 4.3: Harmonic Progression, Functional Harmony, and Cadences

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in performed music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
